bio:treatment.discussion: The Texas species are unusual in their scaly capsules and flowers with scaly sepals, petals, and ovaries.

references.reference: Burt-Utley, K. and J. F. Utley. 1987. Contributions toward a revision of Hechtia (Bromeliaceae). Brittonia 39: 37--43.
